casebody.data:
In the Matter of DISCIPLINE OF Robert E. LINK, III. No. D-2799. Supreme Court of the United States Aug. 29, 2014.

Opinion

Robert E. Link, III., of East Norwich, New York, is suspended from the practice of law in this Court and a rule will issue, returnable within 40 days, requiring him to show cause why he should not be disbarred from the practice of law in this Court.
